M@ziki aims to provide to users better services and ensure that their travel is as comfortable as possible. It is for this reason we provide this space for user to report issues the may have with the content privided or services provided by either us as a company or maatatu. Matatu Operators: REPORT Matatu Operators Dangerous and wreckless driving Overpricing rowdiness and inapporiate behaviour vulgar language from operators Harassment Sex Harassment drunk while on duty Music on the matatu Bad quality sound Vulgar language in music and other inapproriate content Different music to the one claimed by matatu to provide Matziki services on the matatu Bad internet connection on matatu To assist in better service delivery please provide more information about your report
